Package com.irurueta.units

Class Measurement<T extends Enum<?>>

java.lang.Object
com.irurueta.units.Measurement<T>
Type Parameters:
T - a measurement unit.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Acceleration, Angle, AngularAcceleration, AngularSpeed, Distance, Frequency, MagneticFluxDensity, Speed, Surface, Temperature, Time, Volume, Weight
public abstract class Measurement<T extends Enum<?>> extends Object implements Serializable
Base class to define a measurement unit and value.
